meanings.sent1: The juice from the fruit was easily extractable.
meanings.sent2: The honey was extractable from the comb with a special tool.
meanings.sent3: The extractable scent of the flowers attracted bees from afar.
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom was extractable from the stories she shared.
meanings.sent5: The extractable color of the sunset painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.

meanings.definition: Able to be removed or taken out.
meanings.sent1: The extractable tooth was causing him pain.
meanings.sent2: The extractable batteries needed to be replaced.
meanings.sent3: The extractable toy was lost in the pile of other toys.
meanings.sent4: His extractable talent for music shone through in every performance.
meanings.sent5: The extractable key unlocked the mysterious chest hidden in the attic.
